name: powder-snow
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.
